Permanency: Progress:  CYS worker Megan Kromer identified Deb Bostdorf as a foster parent and Summer and David Forte as potential foster to adoptive parents. SW intern and social worker Ali Pomar met with Summer and David by the bedside. Summer and David said that Baby Boy would be discharged to them when applicable, according to their case worker from Jewish Family Life. Summer and David are able to receive medical information regarding Baby Boy but are unable to give consent.
Medical consent must be given by Baby Boy's guardian ad litem James Conville.
